ingredients.@value: garlic, lots of it ( 1 head), minced
sea salt and ground black ppper
500g fish fillet, cut into serving pieces

name.@value: Garlic Fish Fillet and Snow Peas

recipeInstructions.@value: Spoon garlic out of the pan. Add water ⅓ - ½ cup of water to the pan; let it boil then add fish fillet including the marinade liquid, add chill flakes. Let it boil then lower heat to simmer; when water is reduced to half, add the snow peas.
Let cook for one more minute before tasting; adjust seasoning according to taste; turn off heat and plate and serve. Enjoy!
Meanwhile, heat some olive oil and sesame oil; sauté minced garlic until well-browned.

Put fish fillet into a bowl, season with sea salt and black pepper. Grate ginger and squeeze out the juice onto a small bowl; add the ginger pulp to the fish fillet. Combine ginger juice, mirin and soy sauce. Pour the mixture on the fish fillet to marinate it.
